p: A few of the narratives discussed insurance issues, such as loss of coverage or lack of insurance coverage for a period of time, as the main impediment to adhere to the ART medications. Our findings bring more evidence to the existing literature that showed that PLWH who had no insurance coverage were at an increased risk of not taking ART medications [ 38]. Despite the fact that the participants had insurance coverage, a number of them indicated that the co-pay might represent a financial burden.
